export default function HeavyWaves({ children }) {
  const Wave = ({ className }) => {
    return (
      <svg className={className} preserveAspectRatio="none" width="110%" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1440 320">

  );
}
